attributes.action: Reduce the death rate for ovarian cancer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 6,600 women a year are diagnosed with ovarian cancer, 4,400 of those will die.  There is currently no screening test for ovarian cancer, however, a simple blood test CA125 could potentially identify ovarian cancer. I would like to set up a petition to get women to have this blood test when they have their cervical smear test.  It could save money and lives by detecting the disease early.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reduce the death rate for ovarian cancer."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21494


Prime Minister's Office
